summary: E-commerce website for selling paper squishies and slime
architectural_notes: E-commerce platform for physical products (paper squishies and slime)

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog page displaying paper squishies and slime products with images, names, prices, and descriptions
Implement product detail pages that show full product information including multiple images, detailed description, price, and available variants
Create a shopping cart system that allows users to add products, update quantities, and remove items
Implement a checkout flow that collects shipping information and processes payments through Stripe integration
Design a playful, fun visual theme with vibrant colors and whimsical typography that evokes the tactile, colorful nature of squishies and slime, and apply it consistently across all pages
Generate and display product images for paper squishies and slime as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Update the application title in the HTML document head from 'Squishies Shop' to 'Dino Squad'
Update the header logo text in the Layout component from 'Squishies Shop' to 'Dino Squad'
Add a 'Sell' button to the main navigation header in the Layout component, positioned alongside the existing Cart and Login buttons

Create a new Sell page route and component that allows users to list items for sale, including fields for product name, description, price, category (Paper Squishies or Slime), and image upload capability
Connect the Sell page form to the backend actor to submit new product listings when users click a 'Submit for Approval' button

new_feature_requests.summary: E-commerce website with product catalog for paper squishies and slime
Create backend data structures and functions to manage products, including storing product information, retrieving product listings, and fetching individual product details
Create backend order management system to store and retrieve customer orders with product details, shipping information, and payment status
Update any references to 'Squishies Shop' in page headings, meta descriptions, or user-facing text to 'Dino Squad'
Add a sell button to the interface
Implement backend functionality to accept and store seller product submissions, including product details, seller information (linked to Internet Identity), and approval status
